W o D u

WooDu is a doll with a hundred variations, it is a revolutionary in the closed kingdom, it allows people to get rid of a single growth trajectory, no longer stuck to a specific identity throughout their lives.

WooDu is a symbol that ordinary individuals can become all people through hard work, and its existence spreads the idea of freedom to the world.
